attributes.action: act in such a way to ensure that the taxation system is fair and equal to such an extend that no one in the city of London is exempt from any form of taxation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A large number of multi-millionaires in the city of London do not pay income tax.  Therefore the Prime Minister can raise much revenue by the use of a fair taxation system.
